text: apparel proclaims affiliation:With the election fever rising in Kerala, T-shirt-makers are expecting a windfall. In the past if Che Guevara T-shirts were the favourite of Left activists, now those displaying the face of CPI(M) leader V.S. Achuthanandan have a lot of takers. A view from High Road in Thrissur on Monday.— PHOTO: K.K. NAJEEB
title: Wear it on the sleeve
